data.title: Access
data.text:
How to reach us

The University of MÃ¼nster is located in MÃ¼nster, Westphalia, Germany. The adress of the Institute of Mathematical Statistics is OrlÃ©ans-Ring 10 (3rd floor). Of course, you'll find us on Google Maps.

By plane

The Airport DÃ¼sseldorf is the nearest airport equipped with an international transport network. You can reach MÃ¼nster from airport by train in about 90 minutes. For more details see the Travel Service of "Deutsche Bahn". Alternatively, the airport MÃ¼nster-OsnabrÃ¼ck, which has a significant smaller transport system, is located about 30 km in the north of MÃ¼nster. For a connection by train to MÃ¼nster see the Travel Service of "Deutsche Bahn".

Public transport

MÃ¼nster is well connected by train and bus. See here for more details to find the central station or the department. To be more precise, starting at central station, several bus lines lead to the department. Best choices are probably Get off at bus stop "Coesfelder Kreuz" after about 15 minutes. To get to the department, cross the street with traffic lights. There is a flat building right behind the crossing, connected to a 9-story-building which is part of the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science. You will find us in the building which is attached to the north of the tall building.

As an alternative, take a taxi from the main station to the department at "EinsteinstraÃe 62" or "Coesfelder Kreuz".

number 5 direction Gievenbeck/Nienberge,

number 11 direction Gievenbeck,

number 22 direction Gievenbeck.

By car

The parking space of the department is reserved for members of the WWU. Respect the parking signs and recall that in MÃ¼nster cars are towed rigorously. If you stay longer we advise you to take the free parking deck over the road.
